home.title: Create and Share Static Content
home.subtitle: Transform HTML, Markdown, CSV and Excel files into permanent, shareable links
home.whatIsDescription: A powerful static application that allows you to create shareable pages and files via link. Your content is compressed and encoded into the URL itself, making it accessible from any device without requiring a database or server storage. Features include live preview, content recovery, theme customization, and secure rendering.
home.howWorksDescription: Your content is compressed using advanced algorithms and encoded directly into the URL. The application supports multiple rendering modes: standard view with header/footer, or full-screen mode for immersive content display. All HTML content is rendered securely in sandboxed iframes, and you can download the original files at any time.
home.htmlDesc: Complete web pages with secure iframe rendering, clickable links, and optional full-screen mode
home.markdownDesc: Formatted documents with theme-aware rendering and syntax highlighting
home.csvDesc: Spreadsheets (CSV and XLSX) converted to interactive, sortable tables
home.limitsDescription: For optimal performance and user experience:
home.limitsNote: Larger files work, but may generate longer URLs and impact loading time.
home.portfolio: Interactive project portfolios with live demos
home.showcase: Work showcase with full-screen presentation mode
home.sharing: Quick sharing of formatted documents and data tables
